name: Hero
description:
Bring your content and prototypes to life. Animated. Interactive. Production-Ready. Hero enables you to create living prototypes with dynamic data and custom scripts or you can go all the way and create production-ready, engaging and animated rich content for the web - right in XD.
Highlights:
* Animation Timeline
* Effect System
* Web Export (production-ready)
* Scripting
* Non-Linear Story Telling

Forever free version 1.
Check out our showroom at xdhero.com/showroom to see and feel what is possible.
author: XD Hero
